duties_responsibilities.duty: Developing an expanded audience for onsite event space and organizing smaller events to increase revenue and exposure
Event conceptualization and planning for membership gatherings nationwide in conjunction with internal stakeholders
Oversight of regular membership events at external venues, including registration, coordinating hotels and travel, securing RFPs, managing budgets, and post-event evaluation sequences

education_certification.credential: BA/BS in Events Management, Hospitality, Marketing, or a related field
